quote.issuer_name: Shanghai Able Digital Science&Tech Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Shanghai Able Digital Science&Tech Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Shanghai Able Digital Science&Tech Co Ltd is a China-based company primarily engaged in the provision of digital teaching and learning solutions for higher education institutions. The Company’s main businesses include the delivery and operation of digital educational content and digital teaching and learning environment services and products for higher education institutions. The Company’s services and products cover about 12 disciplines and 92 subjects recognized by the Ministry of Education. The digitalization for the higher education teaching and learning encompasses both educational content digitization and teaching and learning environment digitalization. The digital educational contents include digital courses, knowledge graphs and virtual simulation courses. The digital teaching and learning environment services and products include cloud-based LMS (learning management system) and digital classrooms. The Company mainly operates its businesses in the domestic market.
